nodes.bodyText: IMO, better to convert into kotlin class
I think the app should be a loader while fetching the date banner data.
better to rename like fetchDataBannerInfo as isProblemXBlock seems boolean return type method.
can be removed after the snack bar implant, and their usage too.
IMO The duration  of the error message visibility is more suitable here.
deserve docstring that duration is not used here cuz Dialog shouldn't auto-hide.
We have to create the util for  initInfoBanner & showShiftDateSnackBar using at muitple classes.
I have implemented the initInfoBanner in utils class but for snackbar we have to pass too many arguments so I avoid it
create an intent to move on course dates.

We have to show the showShiftDateSnackBar on other screens too, Story description
- Success toast message should also appear when learner shifts date from Course home or Dates page
no need to add canFetchBannerInfo as we have to refresh the course date banner after shifting the date.
initObserver should be move-in onViewCreated and call only once. that also remove the recursive behavior of webview loading.
should be moved in initObserver to avoid the init crash
by default button is hidden, and on the response of the date shifted API, banner info API also called so don't need to handle this case
no need to add an extra member, can be removed.
IMO setupCourseDatesBanner is more appropriate here.
